desc.eng: Adds an extra Skill slot for the Psychic Powers instead of your belt equipments.

Desc.eng: A crate containing items confiscated or retrieved in the area of Inquisitorial operations.
A crate containing premium items confiscated or retrieved in the area of Inquisitorial operations.

desc.eng: Bestows +100% Experience bonus for the next 5 missions.
Completes all items in the crafting queue immediately.
Awards 1 Skill-Tree Reset point. One such point allows redistribution of all Skill points that were spent on one specific skill tree.
Bestows +50% Damage bonus for the next 5 missions.
Bestows 1 additional Allowed Death for the next 5 missions.
Doubles the chance of finding a Relic item in the next 5 Tarot missions.

15% Explode on kill, dealing area damage for 50% of the slain opponent's max HP
+50% damage to Medium range targets (up to 10m), -20% damage at longer ranges
20% to inflict Blind
Triggers a Rosarius Force Field when Stunned or Knocked Down (for 50% of the normal duration)
10% of missing HP restored on a Daemon kill
+50% Damage to the next attack after a successful Block
Kills trigger a Shock aura for 2 seconds (non-stacking)
2% to trigger a Rosarius Force Field when hit
10% to trigger a Fabricator Scatter Field when hit
Hits suffered generate Death Marks on the attacker
Hits suffered generate Needler Toxin effect on the attacker
Incoming damage generates Shock effect on the attacker (25% chance, melee only)
Incoming damage generates Shock effect on the attacker (30% chance in melee, 10% against ranged enemies.)
10% chance to Summon Nurgling on kill (ally, 2 minute duration)
Hits bestow a random Vulnerability (Heat, Warp, Physical) upon the target (stacking)
Stunned enemies explode on kill, dealing area damage (for 10x of the killing blow)
Hits deal Knockback and Slow to target (15% chance per hit)
Hits deal Shock to target (10% chance per hit)
Hits deal a Toxin Mark to target (10 sec duration, -5% damage, stacking)
10% to evade attacks and Reflect damage back to the attacker
-50% Class Resource cost to Armour skills
+60% more warp Damage when on Low Life (Below 25% maximum Health)
25% chance to create electric arcs when striking an enemy. The arcs hit the two nearest enemies to the target
Every 10th killed enemy creates an explosion that deals damage equal to the maximum Health of the killed enemy
After killing an enemy, the next attack has 50% chance to stun its target
+5 Movement speed in Suppressed state, +15 Movement speed in Overwhelmed state
Each killing blow heals an amount equal to the damage dealt
Increase your Life per Second by up to 100% based on your missing Life
Deflected attacks have 25% chance to be redirected to the attacker
+40 to Deflect for 10 seconds after blocking an attack with Shield Block
Each attack has a chance to gain Armour Piercing equal to Deflect value
Turns your Deflect Value into an equal percent of damage bonus
Each attack has a chance to gain Flashbane equal to Deflect value
Deflected attacks have 10% chance to create a shockwave, dealing Physical damage and slowing or stunning enemies
Grants +10% Damage Reduction while Suppression Resistance is in the green
Each Critical hit heals 3% of your Hitpoints
Heal 10% of your Hitpoints per second while the Execution bonus is active
Each Critical hit has a 20% chance to create a Rosarius force field
+100% Damage bonus while the Execution bonus is active
Each Critical hit regenerates 1 point of Focus
Each Critical Hit inflicts Shock on the target
Each Critical Hit inflicts Slow on the target
Each Critical Hit causes Bleeding on the target
{vulnerability_efficiency,100} to all Vulnerability effects
Each succesfully deflected attack bestows {artifact_enchant,100} damage to your next attack
Each succesfully deflected melee attack has a {artifact_enchant,100} chance to stun the attacker
Medium and Elite kills have a 15% chance to drop a Supply pack
20% chance to resist Knockback and Knockdown effects regardless of your Suppression Resistance
Succesfully stunning an enemy recharges {artifact_enchant} Suppression Resistance
Succesfully deflecting an enemy attack recharges 5 Suppression Resistance
+5% Critical Hit chance and +10% Critical Hit Strength against enemies affected by Slow, Stun, Shock or Freeze
!Special_HP_and_Supression_regen!
20% chance to deal double damage and heal that amount
50% chance to Reflect Damage. The amount of Reflected Damage is based on your missing HP (e.g. 30% Reflect Damage on 70% HP).
Extra Damage based on your missing HP (e.g. +30% Damage on 70% HP).
Damage bonus and chance to Chain equal to the proportion of your missing HP (e.g. +30% Damage and 30% chance to Chain on 70% HP)
Each Critical hit deals double Suppression damage
+50% Damage when targeting enemies over medium range, -20% damage under medium range
Each kill generates Focus based on enemy type
+40% Damage and 10% chance to stun against Slowed and Shocked enemies
Each point of spent Focus heals 2% HP and Suppression
+150 Hp/second for 10 seconds when Suppression Resistance drops to 50% and 10%, +150 Suppression for 10 seconds when HP drops to 50% and 10% (non-stacking)
Succesfully deflected attacks give 100 Suppression and nearby enemies lose 50 Suppression
Demolition armour fires +5 missiles
Single hit skills with Single Target tag deal area damage around the target
Regeneration equal to current Adrenaline/3 HP/second
+100% duration to Suprise bonuses
The first attack with Suprise bonus deals +300% Damage.
+50% Damage while having Suprise bonus
Skills with Sniper Shot tag gain the DoT poison tag
DoT type skill( all type) damage increase by 100% (from 20% to 40%) on skills with 5 sec cooldown or more
+5% Critical Hit Chance and +10% Critical Hit Strength while haveing Suprise bonus
Damage bonus percent equal to current warp Heat/2
-2 warp Heat/ second
+20 movement speed after using a psychic power for 5 seconds (non-stacking)
Using the Teleport skill halves current Cooldown on all equipped psychic powers
+2 to Warp Heat decrease values of all force weapons
+10% Damage for each debuff on the target
+1 Damage Reduction for 5 seconds after each point of Warp Heat gained (stacking)
Currend Warp Heat/5% chance to turn incoming damage to healing
Currend Warp Heat/3% chance to reflect incoming damage to attacker
Currend Warp Heat/3% chance to turn a kill into an AoE explosion
Each psychic power use has a 7% chance to negate the Warp Heat cost of psychic powers used in the next 5 seconds (stacking)
Force weapon single target attacks used after a psychic power have a 10% chance to turn the the single target attack into an AoE attack
Using non-psychic power skills (including armour and utility belt skills) bestows a 15% Damage bonus to the next psychic power (stacks 5 times)
Enemies with debilitating effects on them deal 5% less damage per debilititating effect
+40% Damage to AoE psychic powers
